markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Deinosuchus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2888)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The deinosuchus is a primeval relative of the crocodile, and is an enormous predator capable of catching and eating dinosaurs that wander too close to its domain! Much longer lived than other crocodiles, it can grow to around 30 feet long.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Deinosuchus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2888)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +17; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Deep Breath** A deinosuchus can hold its breath for about 2 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +15 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 175

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +22 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+13 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+11 bludgeoning

**[Aquatic Ambush](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=51)** <actions string="Single Action" />  50 feet

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=77)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Large, 2d8+7 bludgeoning, Rupture 18

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-384" />
name: Deinosuchus
